review: This is a VERY reasonable way to connect your other devices (phone, computer) to stream on your main television screen. Do be aware that the device is powered by an AC cord, so consider that when purchasing and planning your setup. Nobody likes seeing cords hanging all over. That said, it does its job wonderfully. The screensaver standby is a nice touch. If you plan on cutting the cord with cable/satellite, start here, then go pick up an HDTV antenna. http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00DIFIM36/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_10
